commit_threshold.description: The number of kB required in the cache before committing to CouchDB

url.description: The URL to a CouchDB instance.  Example, http://test.com:5984/

energy.description: Particle energy in MeV.  If the PID is a neutrino, this is the muon energy

name.description: The file or DB name for the output

pid.description: PID of particle to generate.  If neutrino, Genie will be used

polarity.description: Which type of muon to focus in

run_number.description: The run number.  If zero, random.

seed.description: Random number seed for Geant4 and Python.  If zero, system clock

vertex.description: The vertex of the simulated particle [mm].  Set to -999, -999, -999 for uniform.
